DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 year . 2 . Subjects must Tear Break Up Time ( TBUT ) < 5 second 3 . Subjects must maximum blink interval ( MBI ) < 10 second 4 . Subjects must willing comply study requirement . 5 . Subjects must understand , sign give copy write Informed Consent form . 1 . Subjects eyes meet inclusion criterion either eye meet exclusion criterion 2 . Subjects pregnant , lactate plan pregnant course study 3 . Subjects know sensitivity plan study concomitant medication 4 . Subjects participate ophthalmic drug device clinical trial within 30 day clinical investigation . 5 . Use ocular drug , study medication , study within 14 day prior study entry ocular medication
